text: A bonus wild People's Choice Awards moment : When Kevin James hosted in 2002, he copied Bjork's famous swan dress. ( Photo : KIM D. JOHNSON, Associated Press ) Since 1975, the People's Choice Awards have given the general public the opportunity to weigh in on the best pop culture works of the year. And through the years the award show has given us a whole bunch of iconic moments : some funny, some awkward and others heartwarming. This year's awards air live November 11 ( E!, 9 p. m. EST / PST ). To get in the spirit, we compiled five of the award show's most memorable moments through the years. More : People's Choice Awards 2018 : The nominees More : 2017 People's Choice Awards winners
